content.query:
DECLARE @cols nvarchar(2000) = 'Id,RowGroup,DbName,TableName'
DECLARE @sql NVARCHAR(4000) = 'SELECT TOP 10 '+ @cols + ' FROM Config.DataRefreshSchedule'
EXEC sp_executesql @sql



DECLARE @keys NVARCHAR(1000) = 'Id,RowGroup,DbName'
DECLARE @sql NVARCHAR(4000) = '
SELECT STRING_AGG(name,'','')
FROM Sys.columns
WHERE object_id = ''1762105318''
AND name NOT IN ('+ @keys +')'
EXEC sp_executesql @sql

SELECT *
FROM sys.columns
GO
